dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: I think we should launch the new product line next quarter.

dialogue.speaker: Michael
dialogue.text: That sounds feasible, Sarah. Do we have all the marketing materials prepared?

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: Not yet. I'm waiting for the final design approval from the creative team.

dialogue.speaker: Michael
dialogue.text: Okay. Let's schedule a follow-up meeting to finalize the timeline by Friday.
